description: This dataset contains information on bets advertised on 5 gambling operator and 5 gambling affiliate Twitter accounts over a 2 week period from 16/09/2019 to 29/09/2019. Information recorded includes; the bet advertised, when it was advertised, the type of bet, decimal odds, whether the bet won or lost, how many times it was advertised, whether there was a betting inducement, whether it was advertised as a "best" bet and whether the success of the bet was commented upon to followers of the account.
name: Advertised bets on social media by gambling operators and affiliates
